text: Jis roz hum in sab ko ek saath(apni adalat mein) ikattha karenge, phir un logon se jinhon ne shirk kiya hai kahenge ke thehar jao tum bhi aur tumhare banaye huey shareek bhi. Phir hum unke darmiyan se ajnabiyat ka purda hata denge aur unke shareek kahenge ke â€œtum hamari ibadat to nahin karte thay
